channel.title: ~~~~~ClassicX - Bringing back the Classix ~~~~~
channel.description:
Hey everybody i am here too tell you about my Server. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Introduction ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
My server will be like none other, a server that has never been made before. Back in the time of Runescapes 508 days everyone loved it, There was wilderness ditch
pking, No trade limit and what people like to call Fun, But over the years the meaning of
"Fun" has been lost throughout servers, I hope to re-create this.
What my server will have instead of Shops all around the place and Custom home i am going
to make my server like classic RS with the lumbridge home and Goblins at the Goblin House
Npc's where they should be.
My economy will be one of the best in the whole server community. There wont be Drop
Party's, Customs There will be good old classic 317 stuff.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Progress List. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
100% Mellee
100% Mage
100% Range
100% Fletching
100% Fishing
100% Woodcutting
100% Firemaking
100% Agility
100% Crafting
100% Herblore
100% Slayer
Free World Quests
100% Chat effects
Improved Textures
100% Working Orbs
Anti Autoclicker (for better economy)
60% Varry Castle npc's
80% Lummy NPC's
Falador Npc's
Smithing (starting after agile
Npc Drops (starting soon)
As you can see its quite a big project, i will be adding more stuff to the Progress List
~~~~~~~~~~ Posistions ~~~~~~~~~~ Coder - Mursanari Coder - (Open-Server) Coder - (Open-Server)
Owner- Mursanari Co Owner- Hekoo Co Owner- Teh Monzter
Admin - (not hiring) Admin - (not hiring)
Mod - (not hiring) Mod - (not hiring) Mod- (not hiring)
Artist - (open) Artist - (open) Artist - (open)
Website Maker - (open) We want the classic looking Website
~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Some Pictures ~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Anti Auto-Clicker [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/4876/antiautoclicker.png[/img] Working Pickpocketing [img]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/700/pickpocketing.png[/img] Begginer quest [img]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/1912/questml.png[/img] Chat effects [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/2596/16325569.png[/img]
5th of December 100% Agility
100% Crafting
100% Herblore
100% Slayer
Sucsesfully added.
